body: I feel bad for aizawa san, but after reading part 2, yeah onee~chan best girl

I used translator in part2 from what i get, the glasses girl is a dormant slut she's super hornie and after find them and having sex with the mc the slut inside of her broke free, she realice that the childhood friend really love him so she tell him to broke up and be with the childhood friend, but she tell him if he want to have sex with her she'll let him fuck her at any time if he want, in the end the ex is in a hotel with a bunch of guys and she say it's not enough and the guy think that she's some kind of hornie monster, so without realice the childhood friend save the mc from being cucked in the future because soon normal sex it wouldn't have be enough for her
That was quite a ride haha i have'nt read the 2nd chapter im gonna read it now so that was nice ( ╹▽╹ )

Anyway, after reading both chapters, based on my understanding, Aizawa actually did like mc. She wanted to be with him. But when mc showed her that he is more passionate with his childhood friend than her, she gave up and left him. Her being loving cock (though not entirely untrue) is just an excuse for mc. I believe if mc really choses her, she will not be going for all other cocks but only exclusively for mc.

The tagging system for this author is fucked up. This author does have a 2nd chapter of this story which was tagged under his/her name but not this 1st chapter. I saw someone mentioning about the next chapter, went searching for it and found it. This is actually a nice story where the childhood friend wins in the end. I seldom saw stories where childhood friends win his/her love. If anyone wants to read the 2nd chapter https://nhentai.net/g/341964/ but there's only Japanese and Chinese version. Sadly no English version yet.
